sqlMap.select: SELECT G.SER_SPEC_VA SERSPECVA,A.TECH_IMP_ATT_ID TECHIMPATTID, E.STATE STATE,E.SERVICE_ID SERVICEID,B.SERVICE_CN_NAME CNNAME, D.DIR_NAME DIRNAME,A.ATTR_SPEC_VALUE ATTRSPECVALUE, F.COMPONENT_ID COMPONENTID, E.SER_TECH_IMPL_ID SERTECHIMPLID FROM TECH_IMP_ATT A,SERVICE B,DIR_SER_LIST C,DIRECTORY D,SER_TECH_IMPL E,TECH_IMPL F,COMPONENT H,SERVICE_ATT G WHERE B.SERVICE_ID=C.SERVICE_ID AND C.DIR_ID=D.DIR_ID AND E.SERVICE_ID = B.SERVICE_ID AND A.TECH_IMPL_ID = E.TECH_IMPL_ID AND F.TECH_IMPL_ID = E.TECH_IMPL_ID AND H.COMPONENT_ID = F.COMPONENT_ID AND E.STATE NOT IN('X','G') AND F.COMPONENT_ID=#componentId# AND G.SERVICE_ID = B.SERVICE_ID AND G.ATTR_SPEC_ID='19'

SELECT A.ORG_USERNAME ORGUSERNAME,A.EMAIL EMAIL,D.ZONE_NAME ZONENAME,B.CEP_NAME ORGTYPENAME,A.NAME NAME,A.TELEPHONE TELEPHONE, C.CERT_TYPE_NAME CERTTYPENAME,A.CERT_NUMBER CERTNUMBER,A.ADDRESS ADDRESS,to_char(A.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') CREATETIME FROM ORG A,MAIN_DATA B,CERT_TYPE C,AREA D WHERE A.ORG_TYPE_CODE= B.CEP_CODE AND B.MDT_CD = '201' AND C.CERT_TYPE_CODE = A.CERT_TYPE_CODE AND D.AREA_ID = A.AREA_ID AND A.ORG_ID=#orgId#

SELECT DISTINCT a.prod_offer_id, a.prod_offer_name PACKAGENAME, ( SELECT wm_concat(b.product_name) FROM product b, OFFER_PROD_REL c WHERE c.prod_offer_id = a.prod_offer_id AND b.product_id = c.product_id ) PRODUCTS FROM prod_offer a WHERE a.prod_offer_publisher = #componentId# AND a.status_cd != '1300'
